data.name: Xtreme Aces Racing Demo
data.detailed_description:
Xtreme Aces Racing brings a new exciting racing genre with combat mechanics and jets!

You are in the shoes of a rookie pilot of Xtreme Aces Racing league, who must win races and championships to earn the respect of fans (and rivals) and be the next Xtreme Aces World Champion.

Be the first to see the checkered flag and leave your rivals in the dust in this beautiful and exciting game!

Main features:


  • For fans of games like Ace Combat, Mario Kart, Onrush - Yes, in Xtreme Aces Racing these games mix them all up! lol
  • Race with different types of jets, each with its advantages and disadvantages
  • 10 beautiful, handcrafted levels in different locations around the globe (2 of them available in demo version)
  • Use the powerup boxes to defend yourself (shield, repair and mine) or attack rivals (missiles and machine gun)
  • Achieve insane speeds with the booster button
  • Arcade and championship modes to play alone or to challenge a friend (championship and split screen available in full version)
  • Smart AI with multiple difficulty levels for a better gaming experience
  • Full gamepad and keyboard compatibility

data.short_description: Xtreme Aces Racing brings a new exciting racing genre with combat mechanics and jets! Choose your favorite jet and race through stunning locations around the globe. Defeat your enemies using attack and defense powerups and be the first to see the checkered flag.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4GHz CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 / Radeon R7 260X
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.8GHz CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
